title: Getting Started with Elm
description: A comprehensive guide to learning Elm, from basic concepts to building your first application. Perfect for developers looking to explore functional programming.

title: Building a Personal Blog with Elm
description: Learn how I built this blog using Elm and modern web technologies. A deep dive into the architecture and design decisions.

title: The Beauty of Functional Programming
description: Exploring the elegance and benefits of functional programming paradigms, with practical examples and real-world applications.
